UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Biological and structural effects of the conjugation of an antimicrobial decapeptide with saturated, unsaturated, methoxylated and branched fatty acids.
Literature.Author: Húmpola MV, Rey MC, Carballeira NM, Simonetta AC, Tonarelli GG
